title: Welsh leek and bacon pudding
ingredients: ['25g (1 oz) butter', '6 thin slices bread, cut into quarters', '1 large leek, trimmed and finely chopped', '85g (3 oz) streaky bacon or pancetta, chopped', '110g (4 oz) Caerphilly or Cheshire cheese, grated', '2 large eggs', '450ml (3/4 pt) milk', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and finely ground black pepper to taste']
